resources.string: This test is to demonstrate the available transformations. Scale, Translate, and Rotate (in local and world center axis).
This test show how can be applied a force to a node with a physics body component. Tap to make the square to jump.
This test shows several colliding nodes. Some of them change its color to show the collision. Also,when they stop colliding changes their colors as well.

This scene is to test render order when z-buffer is disabled. Circle is at z=250, and rectangle at z=50 (250 is frant layer and 50 back layer. Background is at z=0). But since the z-buffer is disabled and the first object to be drawn is Circle, Rectangle is in front of Circle.
Scene to test the movement of parenting nodes. The circle is parented to rectangle. We only move rectangle.
